about_the_game:
Welcome to the spine-chilling world of Paranormal Mission, the ultimate spot-the-difference game that will put your observation skills to the test! This game features three unique maps: Apartment Building, Hospital, and Japanese Gym, each with its own eerie atmosphere and spine-tingling sounds.

In Paranormal Mission, you'll start in Normal mode, where you'll be challenged to identify the differences between two seemingly identical images before time runs out. But beware, anomalies are lurking in the shadows, waiting to trip you up. You'll need to stay alert and keep your eyes peeled because if you miss more than four anomalies, it's game over!

Don't worry, brave adventurer, if you manage to beat Normal mode, you'll unlock the more challenging Endless mode, where the anomalies are endless, and your observation skills will be put to the ultimate test!

So, what are you waiting for? Embark on your Paranormal Mission today and prove that you have what it takes to conquer the anomalies and spot the differences!

In Paranormal Mission, you'll start in Normal mode, where you'll be challenged to identify the differences between two seemingly identical images before time runs out. But beware, anomalies are lurking in the shadows, waiting to trip you up. You'll need to stay alert and keep your eyes peeled because if you miss more than four anomalies, it's game over!

Don't worry, brave adventurer, if you manage to beat Normal mode, you'll unlock the more challenging Endless mode, where the anomalies are endless, and your observation skills will be put to the ultimate test!

So, what are you waiting for? Embark on your Paranormal Mission today and prove that you have what it takes to conquer the anomalies and spot the differences!
name: Paranormal Mission

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to Paranormal Mission, the thrilling spot-the-difference game that will put your powers of observation to the ultimate test!
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian, Korean, Greek, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese
